To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MorningStar _morningstar;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_morningstar = MorningStar(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_morningstar.IsReady)
{
    var current = _morningstar.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.morningstar = self.MorningStar(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.morningstar.IsReady:
    current = self.morningstar.Current.Value
